name: triggerRpcEvent
shortDescription: Manually sends an RPC event to all RPC event servers
description: This method manually calls an RPC event method on all RPC event servers. Currently supported methods are "deleteDevices", "newDevices", and "updateDevice"

parameters.name: eventMethod
parameters.description:
This is the method you want to call. The following methods are currently supported:
  • deleteDevices
  • newDevices
  • updateDevice

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description:
The parameters you want to pass to the event method
  • deleteDevices:Array<String> deviceAddresses, Array<Struct> deviceInfo
  • newDevices:Array<DeviceDescription> devices
  • deleteDevices:Integer peerId, integer channel, string address, integer flags
Please see the method's documentation for more information about the parameters.
